de.esoco.ewt.impl.gwt.material.layout

Class MaterialSwitchPanelLayout<P extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IndexedPanel & com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasWidgets,W extends gwt.material.design.client.base.MaterialWidget>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.ewt.layout.GenericLayout
      • de.esoco.ewt.component.SwitchPanel.SwitchPanelLayout
        • de.esoco.ewt.impl.gwt.material.layout.MaterialSwitchPanelLayout<P,W>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.esoco.lib.property.SingleSelection
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MaterialStackPanelLayout, MaterialTabPanelLayout

    public abstract class MaterialSwitchPanelLayout<P extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IndexedPanel & com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasWidgets,W extends gwt.material.design.client.base.MaterialWidget>
extends de.esoco.ewt.component.SwitchPanel.SwitchPanelLayout
    A base class for GWT Material switch panels that manages the content widgets and the wrapping widgets that contain them and that can be switched between.
